alert.note: Alert for Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:25PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SENECA...NORTH CENTRAL YATES AND NORTHWESTERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... At 525 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chimney Bluffs State Park to near Lyons to near Potter, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Seneca Falls, Waterloo, Fayette, Sennett, Benton, Union Springs, Tyre, Cayuga and Canoga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
